column1: Aging men are often less able to have repeated ejaculations.
Disorders, such as diabetes, can also cause ED.
Erectile dysfunction that is caused by medicines or illness is often successfully treated.
Changes in the prostate gland make elderly men more likely to have urinary tract infections.
Prostate gland infections or inflammation (prostatitis) may also occur.
Testicular cancers are possible, but these occur more often in younger men.
Getting treated for health disorders such as high blood pressure and diabetes may prevent problems with urinary and sexual function.
